Fichtelgebirge.title: Fichtelgebirge
Fichtelgebirge.byline: Fichtelgebirge (Fichtel Mountains) is arranged like a horseshoe around an inner hill-landscape in Upper Franconia

Ficksburg.title: Ficksburg
Ficksburg.byline: Ficksburg is the second busiest and important town in the Eastern Free State region, after Bethlehem (the chief administrative town).
